Title: Very nice DSLR
Cons: None that can't be changed in the menu.
Pros:
Takes very nice pictures right out of the box. Has the auto-focus motor the D60 and lower lack.
Nice weight and size.
Comments: I recommend getting the 18-135 with this camera.

Pros: Right out of the box; Great Pictures.

Title: Great Camera !
Cons: My package musta been opened b4 I got it.Id hate to send it back ,and it seems to be working fine so Ill stick with it.Also It was unable to add inches to my manhood,but this I will have to deal with!
Pros: This camera takes a really nice clear picture right out of the box.Im a novice and its really simple to use,Its just the right size too.Some of the higher priced cameras are way too big.
